resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-resources
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server resources
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all resources for the MCP server specified by {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-resource-templates
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server resource templates
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all resource templates (lists, folders, etc) for the MCP server specified by {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-prompts
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server prompts
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all prompts configured for the MCP server specified by {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-resource
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server resource
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a single resource with name {resourceName} from the specified MCP server {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-resource-template
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server resource template
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a single resource template with name {templateName} from the specified MCP server {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-server-prompt
resourceTemplates.title: MCP server prompt
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves a single prompt with name {promptName} from the specified MCP server {serverName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-plugin-tools
resourceTemplates.title: MCP plugin tools
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all tools available for the plugin specified by {pluginName}.
